Test Copy and Paste
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_createObjects
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
clickAndWaitFolder_copy:method
verifyTextPresentPlease select one or more items to copy first.
click//*[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']//input[@type="checkbox"]
clickAndWaitFolder_copy:method
verifyTextPresentItem(s) copied.
open${base_url}/bar_module/view
clickAndWaitFolder_paste:method
verifyTextPresentItem(s) paste in progress.
open${base_url}/bar_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/bar_module/view
verifyText//*[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]//a[not(@title)]0
open${base_url}/bar_module/0/Base_viewHistory
verifyTextx0_listbox_record_number2 record(s)
verifyTextx0_listbox_data_line_1regexp:Object copied from /.*/foo_module/0$
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
verifyText//*[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]//a[not(@title)]0
verifyText//*[@id="listbox_data_line_1"]//a[not(@title)]1
verifyText//*[@id="listbox_data_line_2"]//a[not(@title)]2
verifyElementNotPresentid=listbox_data_line_3
